Reviews.Title: “Noisy, dated hotel; mediocre service”
Reviews.Author: Mariana R
Reviews.Content: hotel clean communication problem staff particularly resturant lovely friendly lady spoke word english breakfast poor value dont cold coffee cake like scrambled egg everything runs quickly replaced cost excessive 12 euros per person extremely helpful gentleman reception though english better mine

Reviews.Title: “Great location.”
Reviews.Author: judfry1
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel february 2008 hotel well located two blocks one main railway station barcelona sants underground station room big us seemed taken well care clean towels snow white clean complain maid service sheet washed clean enough big stain place one cannot overlooks third day stay came back room bath tub definitely cleaned breakfast delicious coffee awful tv english channels bbc world cnn sky news

Reviews.Title: “Location is superior”
Reviews.Author: Vivian B
Reviews.Content: hotel old enough interesting new enough nice little tv little bed ok cleanliness slightly drab nothing hotel especially good bad adequate within walking distance subway area interest tourists reason stay would business near wanted close train station note multiple train stations sure one want got smoking deal dont say place terrible tourist could would look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Right next to Vatican”
Reviews.Author: The_Wayfarer2
Reviews.Content: great location 5 mins sants metro staff really friendly breakfast decor nice clean would stay

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy Rome See the Vatican”
Reviews.Author: imf8819
Reviews.Content: dont like giving poor reviews unfortunately hotel deserves rating noise room facing courtyard 5th floor every night people would go courtyard even school night around 11pm midnight make complete hour would room awful woke couldnt fall back asleep im light sleeper think people live building guests probably wont better luck called reception multiple times complain one pick phone even claim reception woman alone didnt want go downstairs window get sleep walls absolutely paper thin hear people walking clearly make theyre saying outside room added although confirmation didnt room arrived really annoying ended give junior suite couch curtain stained one phones didnt work felt completely unsafe apartment building people come without go reception friend booked got eur 10 discount room got receptionist told us mistake shouldnt able get discount online would offer upon checkout different receptionist charged eur 10 said pay putting receptionist upon checkout said credit card hadnt charged since room never booked happy gave junior suite irritating cleanest place ive stuck feet walked cold floor room phone handle walls beat covered spots door locks mine friends room stuck hard open one good thing hotel location minutes vatican think probably better staying bb close

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: Valerie5510
Reviews.Content: amalia great location rome rooms small clean wife booked room ensuite means bathroom room downstairs right outside amalia great place italian cafe definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean and spacious room, great location!”
Reviews.Author: toyshop
Reviews.Content: stayed october 2011 5 days 4 nights going cruise location perfect right center rome 10 minute walk vatican shopping many restaurants near well room small room like suite price paid mentioned front desk willing adjust first come first serve think would stay knew room getting clean staff friendly helpful daily continental breakfast decent one problem tv italian dont speak language didnt dont turn tv cause annoying watching language cannot speak understand

Reviews.Title: “great location, clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: BubbleSnow
Reviews.Content: right next vatican metro stop within 5min walk hotel tastefully decorated rooms large clean elevator one old style elegant ones need close door lovely negatives complementary toiletries eg shampoo bathroom dining area breakfast little small quickly service typically roman minimal best certainly done even hint smile rome good hotel bit pricey value money possible rome

Reviews.Title: “Average rooms great location”
Reviews.Author: Warwicker08
Reviews.Content: frills family adults teenagers stayed amalia room dec luckily driver hotel knew hotel otherwise dont think would found staff quiet dont ask something definitely arent going come forward make recommendations room little small 4 people clean cleaning staff excellent helpful morning breakfast pretty good lobby staff frequently made feel like guest paying customer decision staying location great access vatican metro shopping looks like hotel process starting renovations

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great location, kind staff”
Reviews.Author: astrogidget
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel first week december booked hotels price could paid booked straight hotel option cancel book sure given better room book straight hotel cause room given like cell soon open window find units empty bottles nearby restaurant thats view see nothing else good option location 5 minutes walk vatican square rest see read hotel breakfast normal poor one tea coffee juice

Reviews.Title: “Very clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chuck757
Reviews.Content: made reservation double classic 2 nights arrived early pleased checked early room spacious clean window view room wasnt great though distance vatican superb 10 minutes away 5 minutes metro one thing dont quite like staff service dont expect super service fair respond queries help honestly approach dont offer help make recommendation greet leave return would also expect 3 stars hotel offer bottled drink bar fridge without charge experienced italy hotels told charges hotel room enquired bottled water overall experience wasnt bad would say lot better staff responsive friendly

Reviews.Title: “3 Star - No way !”
Reviews.Author: karimba1
Reviews.Content: close metro walk 5 mins even next train track windows sealed great healthy person dont bother going breakfast cakes sweet pastries

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Ok, great location & best staff!”
Reviews.Author: Nu327
Reviews.Content: stayed recently anniversary trip italy hotel fantastic location minutes walk vatican close good restaurants lots shopping even walked trevi fountain spanish steps hotel modest seemed clean staff friendly overly helpful theyll answer questions didnt seem want go way room small bare bones bed comfortable exhausted really didnt matter breakfast fine nothing special definitely overall satisfied stay knew staying budget hotel going get im sure id stay dont staying time

Reviews.Title: “ordinary”
Reviews.Author: Angelrah79
Reviews.Content: amalia hotel located via meters service shops resturants hospitality cordial service always good early morning person good however wake later seem disappointing staff table setting nicely later morning everyone trying enter small room best many people time make service difficult chose hotel past stay rome disappointed choice

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel - great value and top location!!”
Reviews.Author: 19ruprect73
Reviews.Content: hotel clean convenient reasonably priced hotel may reception everyone helpful asked two rooms close carefully managed hotel made trip easier fellow traveller breakfasts typically italian looking something substantial may need snack later bathrooms seem refurbished since previous visit 2007 provide requirements aircon works well safe room welcome addition flat screen tvs may need tv whilst away home restaurants vicinity good quality local clientele close metro ottaviano hotel arrange taxis good rate tofrom airports need good rate short walk st peters hop onoff bus stops needed

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, perfect for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: Monkey6870
Reviews.Content: returned 16 trip rome stayed 6 nights amalia excellent hotel first time visitor ive stayed many hotels europe one bigger ones first rome im sure others good size comfortable two us large bathroom two twin beds put together also large closet desk refrigerator lock box wifi access hotel clean friendly staff stayed rm top floor elevator access stairs available well easy take luggage necessary breakfast included mix items using hotel half block away vatican two blocks away metro two blocks numerous cafes restaurants within block ac worked well night allowed us keep window open bring busy street sounds closed wasnt problem fresh evening air nice sleeping wifi 5 euro 3 enough light web overall great hotel highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION,CLEAN,NICE,VALUE4MONEY!”
Reviews.Author: Pike2011
Reviews.Content: family stayed two nights although rooms little tight pleased friendly staff good ac extremely clean well maintained located blocks vatican trains buses make great choice would stay visiting rome

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, friendly, well located and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: OttawaTraveller002
Reviews.Content: six night stay hotel pleased fair start positives hotel first location two blocks vatican found hotel perfect base stay rome neighborhood seemed friendly next door nice lunch counter excellent sandwiches good price hard find rome side hotel small could buy bottled water morning left sightseeing secondly delightful young woman desk helpful cheerful asked accomodate us early breakfast couple mornings since sightseeing departure prior normal breakfast time happy help us regard additionally answered questions didnt give us impression bother hotel needs renovated carpet room dirty needed stains tiny bathroom stains toilet bowl wall near ceiling corners bathroom needed good remove mildew first night called front desk television working male desk clerk came room didnt appear happy regarding time discovered connection asked numbers english channels amount time channels said didnt know couple days later called front desk asked told didnt know asking told channel numbers change didnt know english channel numbers highly suspect explanation able watch tv entire stay hotel first night incredible stench hallway outside room able fortunately went away didnt deal ran toilet paper two stay third day came back sightseeing find door left maid called front desk report real response two days later came back end day door feeling safe property fortunately nothing stolen room breakfast provided plenty breads sweets along coffeetea meat provided sliced ham tasted like cheese plastic slices little day day price paid stay hotel breakfast better morning departure power went getting ready go airport called front desk apparently thankfully power restored room small bathroom told prior going rome greatly expectations compared american hotels based price paid us would easily provided room hotel could bring price condition property disappointed stay really significant negative trip italy

Reviews.Title: “We loved everything, except the breakfast”
Reviews.Author: anne_flute
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel amalia 4 nights end march 2011 first time rome little unsure finding hotel worry 5 minutes walk metro station large road junction several bus routes cross main road quite literally vatican city great location hotel clean sheets ive ever seen room king size bed werent expecting nice surprise well equipped double wardrobe ensuite tv minibar safe free charge breakfast room light airy breakfast fresh good selection cereals breads pastries fruit tea coffee etc best part us hotel staff among friendliest people met travels helped us transport questions tourist advice well joke two us nice people definitely back rome staying hotel amalia return much great hotel experience

Reviews.Title: “Great Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: nesrin_10
Reviews.Content: two rooms hotel loved rooms lovely clean breakfast good great location see vatican near metro go sightseeing near lovely cafes restaurants female receptionist duty time helpful spoke good english weve rome twice may return done would stay hotel would recommend others

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: akey1101
Reviews.Content: hotel situated near vatican city n couple blocks peter nearby metro station bus station n many clean great value 4 recomend

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Clean and Comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: sage09
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel fall 2009 single room green room clean quiet comfortable quite spacious staff friendly thought excellent value money charged hotel central vatican museums rome metro system couple blocks away get everywhere else quickly local neighbourhood many shops restaurants problem restaurant hotel evening meals continental breakfast included would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Recommended Hotel - Cheap and very Cheerful ! I would use again”
Reviews.Author: darylclonic
Reviews.Content: great little hotel comfortable room facing inner courtyard much quieter rooms street daughter husband found room noisy street sounds mattress comfortable mattress home little dressing area well oversized bathroom daughters room smaller smaller bathroom still pleasant loved location side street near vatican got know neighbourhood since stayed next door cafe store fun shop inexpensive internet cafe block found number good restaurants area staff front desk friendly helpful especially leonardo maria thanks much excellent service disappointment breakfast served pleasant room selection limited cereal plain rolls various extremely sweet pastries jams one kind soft cheese coffee major tasted awful tries gave switched tea land excellent coffee got going great coffee shop block ottaviano morning leaving hotel daughter cannot almost nothing could breakfast first day 2 hot milk found grocery store brought fresh fruit yogurt bread us breakfast suggestion hotel would please add fresh fruit yogurt maybe boiled eggs bread restaurants offerings perhaps extend breakfast hours 10 since almost everyone seemed rush 9 please please good coffee grazie would love stay especially changes made

Reviews.Title: “OK location”
Reviews.Author: mani1
Reviews.Content: second time stay amalia hotel rome great friendly hotel staff helpful provided lots information recommendation great location fantastic many local resturants around home made food go shopping best part two blocks vatican love hotel always stay go rome

Reviews.Title: “Good value - great location”
Reviews.Author: MJandLontour
Reviews.Content: stayed six nights july probably romes busiest month amalia located across main tourist areas little quieter nice evenings great close vatican though line 2 blocks hotel take pretty much anywhere else want city amalia exactly expected roman hotel room small bed taking room also desk wardrobe flatscreen tv mounted wall large window looked street second floor meant didnt need use elevator often bed two pillows surprisingly comfortable got best sleep vacation despite bathroom probably disappointing aspect hotel toilet duvet sink shower tiny plastic door leaked bit wasnt great water pressure breakfast typical coffee juices pastries bread cheese staff elsewhere hotel always wonderful attentive gave us excellent recommendations stores restaurants internet pretty expensive always used nearby internet cafe calls werent outrageous could make much cheaper block overall excellent stay basic thats looking main draw obviously city great way end days would definitely use returned city

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, Brilliant Location!”
Reviews.Author: hayleybailey
Reviews.Content: stayed april 2010 single room problems hotel unless youre prepared bucks italian hotel rooms basic anyway rooms fine clean comfortable breakfast great staff friendly helpful wifi available rooms cost per 3 hours bathroom clean minor negative shower cramped since 4 minutes day concern would definitely return hotel couple minutes away vatican metro ottaviano

Reviews.Title: “A Amalia”
Reviews.Author: eor40
Reviews.Content: stayed march 2010 two night break arrived hotel around allowed check given key room nice check usual til 200 lucky enough room view vatican yes rooms basic certainly needed short break wardrobe queen size bed mini bar etc room clean bathroom breakfast croissants cakes cereal etc choice orange juice tea coffee fresh set day hotel short walk vatican restaurants shops nearby would recommend getting bus colloseum top road 1 euro got bus walked back taking sites trevi fountain spanish steps etc want stop coffee stand bar 1 euro sit table 3 euros also think restaurants pricey home also added 750 euros service charge bar bottom road bus stops charge 600 euros beer obviously city expect pay overall would highly recommend hotel reception staff helpful giving us info needed get around would stay

Reviews.Title: “clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: CanadaBunky
Reviews.Content: choose stay amalia hotel pay room 5th floor 3rd floor bath room bad condition shower mold looked like decent cleaning several years complained nothing room faced main street traffic kept us awake night especially room soundproof rooms either hear everything sad room breakfast poor tried location fine front desk helpful restaurants ordering taxi night

Reviews.Title: “very clean rooms and so close to the vatican”
Reviews.Author: tweetypie009
Reviews.Content: hotel sits peters metro station vatican 2 minute walk making perfect location seeing whole rome opposite st peters square line bus stops sight seeing buses found great way getting around hotel basic amenities limited room good size clean tips room overlooking via able spend time watch people go window full bus tour first get idea everything use hop onoff arrangement get everywhere also lucky enough wonder st peters around arrival got st peters basilica without use little yellow man google maps drop onto look round junction via see entrance hotel left otherwise v difficult find

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely average, but adequate”
Reviews.Author: CarlisleFJ
Reviews.Content: terrible breakfast table replaced minimal breakfast choices least amongst 6 hotels cities stayed similar rate used towels replaced request torn dirty blocked bath tub flooding soap shampoo morning call request hotel old building block

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay at the Amalia”
Reviews.Author: Saorise
Reviews.Content: reading reviews group worried staying hotel hotel well priced good rooms good see st peters dome bad low budget hotel reception entrance big deal adds romantic feel basic clean bedding also reception helpful always smile us sure rooms may mark well travelled expect height 4 star happy location

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value room in a prime location”
Reviews.Author: omareliwi
Reviews.Content: amalia perfect location us 10 minute walk vatican st peters 15 minute walk castel saint 5 minute walk subway would take great spots like trevi fountain spanish steps piazza del colloseum hills etc walked st peters everyday start sight seeing day since amalia close subway would recommend roma pass good 3 days unlimited subway use free access colloseum hills borghese museum room small barely bed 2 twins make surprisingly comfortable firm didnt feel middle bathroom small functional showers powerful temperature sensitive didnt provide shampoo soap ask internet 3 hours use card stayed room connection bad used laptop internet breakfast connection room better front desk nice helpful breakfast buffet fine european breakfast cereal croissants bread cakes coffee orange juice nice way start day amalia perfect us would stay

Reviews.Title: “a solid room near the vatican and metro line”
Reviews.Author: chris1999
Reviews.Content: amalia four nights men working front desk surly give us wakeup calls arrange airport transportation felt annoying question request room clean spacious dirty wallpaper spots ceiling shower bathtub bed linens seen better days tv remote barely holding together sister room price like different hotel nice wallpaper bathtub flat screen tv book room make sure one superior rooms standard

Reviews.Title: “great location, erratic stay, not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Riazat
Reviews.Content: hotel amalia great place start trip front desk helpful willing anything us hallways generally quiet clean room roomy air conditioner worked like charm rome bathroom nice small shower comes italy good location situated near vatican metro stop

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, I'd go there again!”
Reviews.Author: LoonySwiss
Reviews.Content: stayed amalia hotel july 2008 third time thought posted review doesnt seem made onto review section also happened review wrote oct must something wrong third visit amalia disappoint would recommend anyone stay always stay superior room never found fault breakfast continental buffet serving bread rolls cereal juice coffee etc perfectly adequate plan return rome 2009 booking amalia

Reviews.Title: “best location”
Reviews.Author: yorkieinlondon
Reviews.Content: delighted hotel booked 4 nights via 4 nights price 3 excellent value good location rome arrived big maintenance works going small reception area greeted friendly woman spoke good english checked room happy size clean twin beds put together large comfortable beds quite hard didnt mind good view hustle bustle street window see people mean showers hard work tiny cubicle get used arent big person ok water breakfast sweet lot cake cheese break excellent coffee orange juice sound much like travel used stay hotel location 2 blocks away metro station ottaviano 5 stops termini little 5 minute walk vatican brilliant neighbourhood nice lots restaurants area offering good lunch time deals pick near vatican museums word caution get taxi termini station hotel woman met checking got 45 euros get elderly taxi hotel unbelievable especially considering taxis directly airport city centre hotels cost fixed rate 30 euros wife got metro directly termini hotel 1 euro one tip interested good visit directly opposite hotel entrance corner massive plastic ice cream outside excellent ice cream friendly man runs place makes day speaks excellent english bit character

Reviews.Title: “a week in the Amalia...”
Reviews.Author: JawsOGRE
Reviews.Content: hotel bit way also bit trip train station pretty much every hotel trip airport also easy miss taxi problem finding think cost 15 euro get train station metro line two blocks away convenient use within stones throw vatican apartments could see st peters dome hotel room window street loud room clean almost elegant looking staff nice dont speak much anything italian negative check 4 get taxi italian wasnt good english even worse made work though breakfast cereal tea coffee get late pastries good though good restaurants nearby would never eaten hotel restaurant lots way things like trevi fountain colosseum etc easy get using subway hotel seems apartment complex elevator never issue though subway clean efficient sometimes crowded better nyc

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon Haven!!”
Reviews.Author: FisherPair
Reviews.Content: rome one week work reasons chose hotel particular reason hotel building private apartments offices first put ground floor room natural light cigarettes bad air conditioning bed got first night kept awake sound people going need use come complained got moved deluxe room way better great windows clean furniture spacious cooler still cost night september room ok fine 45 seconds st peters square within three four minutes walk two different subway stations lots places catch taxis eat food location terms amazing youre like get piazza fountain 20 minutes max youre working little things stress like theres wifi even though advertised hotel website shower unpleasant plastic door plain cheap laundry room service breakfast heard good things star hotel though

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: LancashireRadley
Reviews.Content: boyfriend booked hotel based good reviews disappointed amalia great hotel stayed four nights hot sunny august perfect location minutes walk underground line leaves termini railway station end come take express train rome nice area rome minutes walk vatican museums got morning rooms werent ready could store luggage safe place got superior room top floor good view dome st peter room quiet good air conditioning system need pay extra worth summer spotlessly clean liked fact floors stone carpet lot cleaner loved oldfashioned lift loved breakfast buffet gave us everything needed although bit sweet side theres cheese ham fruits sweet dry cakes cereals one best coffees ive ever staff always friendly even helped us request booking special sightseeing speak english dont look another hotel go amalia great experience theres nice restaurant round block hotel left left right side road called della pizza great find good food expensive wonderful lovely meats

Reviews.Title: “Great Value & Location”
Reviews.Author: vocjewl
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights b b basis hotel clean comfortable fabulous location seeing best attractions rome arrival warmly greeted shown room upgrade room view vatican room may slightly better view room clean comfortable good hot shower standard rooms looked decent little smaller superior rooms breakfast continental type adequate buffet style including teacoffee help much want found staff helpful friendly especially maria reception happy give us tourist tips taxi ciampino airport hotel euros bus airport centre rome 6 euros run every 30 minutes touring foot vatican 5 minutes walk away sites within walking distance purchase day pass metro local buses 4 euros visited vatican chapel etc 14 euros well worth money spent half day whole experience guide available hire 6 euros really useful visited cost 6 euros take half day though one best meals chinese restuarant called piazza vatican city wall well worth money also decent irish bar called black near pantheon serves good food beer much see rome fabulous go explore enjoy

Reviews.Title: “uneven experience”
Reviews.Author: JimDel10
Reviews.Content: stayed week amalia early october 2007 location great pedestrian mass transit type people location could fit us better arrived rome venice train easily connected termini subway system hotel blocks one stops close enough walk downtown rome easily steps vatican room huge comparison rooms venice london shower probably smallest places room massive breakfasts filling worked well day exploring rome nothing overly fancy worked well located would hesitate stay amalia

Reviews.Title: “Fine Hotel Good Location”
Reviews.Author: ksmiffy
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel amalia 10 days honeymoon loved initially chose due proximity vatican peters basilica pleased got price reasonable size room location hotel numerous restaurants within walking distance metro stop 2 blocks away hotel guest leave key room desk housekeeping service always prompt fresh towels clean sheets clean room leonardo always friendly helpful front desk well staff whose names cant remember breakfast selections always good even arranged car pick us us airport may 5star hotel get 5star treatment

Reviews.Title: “Would Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: ScouseTomLiverpool
Reviews.Content: went open reading mixed reviews hotel excellant location 5 mins vatican 2 mins nearest metro room clean large ample space bathroom also large shower cubicle small could still shower easily found hotel quiet staff staff recommend restaraunt next street good cheap eateries local area tended select ones police training centre never poor meal rome seemed dirty smelly went feb dont know would like summer months

Reviews.Title: “Prati Area 3 blocks away from St. Peters/Vatican City”
Reviews.Author: CatholicPilgrim
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel rome 7 nights standard room first 3 nights clean outside view view laundry room small however clean could live last 4 nights upgraded superior room difference size amazing also could see top st peters window nice rated hotel average believe lot budget accommodation rome quite dirty hotel certainly staff pleasant arranged taxi us airport kept bags day departure pay location excellent short distance vatican minutes walk metro access main attractions definately hotel anyone wants clean comfortable easy access base rome

Reviews.Title: “Extremely disappointed”
Reviews.Author: ItaliaTraveler
Reviews.Content: shocked hotel minute arrived entrance really front desk bare little hole elevator tiny old one help rooms small hotel dark peeling wall paper dirty towels thin mattress foam awful pillows also importantly near spanish steps hotel stay quickly found another hotel less money considerably comfortable better location hotel amalia looks nothing like web site brochure

Reviews.Title: “Peace and Quiet near the Vatican City”
Reviews.Author: Bobbio
Reviews.Content: amalia within five minute walk st peters nearest metro station ideal seeing sites 10 minutes metro reach spanish steps trevi fountain area one change get dont bother booking tour go st peters 1000 get spot near see photo close room spotlessly clean air conditioning available time staff helpfull breakfast cakes ideal breakfast could improved selection meats cheese would recommend hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “Reccomendable”
Reviews.Author: Bikesub
Reviews.Content: came back 5 day break rome staying amalia hotel good location noisy near metro cheap get anywhere easily room clean nicely decorated staff helpful fairly good breakfast choice nice pastries great espresso coffee comfy beds safe fridge hairdryer room nice cafe road get coach airport termini area rome get free local map hop metro metro station short walk would definately recommend others would stay

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Scottish_Thistle
Reviews.Content: ive traveled rome many times visit big disappointment hotel arrived around 930 pm saturday shocked see room given weeks requested expedia confirmed directly hotel via email 7 days earlier double room two beds given small room one small bed double could even place two pillows side side certainly two beds requested room inside room notice giving maximum price room price given single room impression room intended double room woman desk trying pleasant unhelpful finding comfortable solution options get two rooms pay difference get room bathroom hall checked manager would even talk us complaint thought highly unprofessional left discuss employee desk charged double room 55 euros higher per night posted maximum charge room employee told us nothing could price agreed expedia saying hadnt given requested expedia finally long conversation took total 30 euros two night stay addition uncomfortable room situation lack attention would warn people hotel wasnt always quiet cleaning woman loudly phone outside room morning cannot recommend place staying

Reviews.Title: “Room okay but shower cubicle tiny”
Reviews.Author: Div1
Reviews.Content: returned first trip stay could hotel amalia perfect staff phone calls us check tours ride back airport room largest bed ever 6 4 new clean little small worked ok location perfect 2 blocks st peters vatican metro also 2 blocks steps etc 510 friends going rome oct would definitely recommend stay amalia hotel also great resturants shops area hotel great find

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, friendly staff but overpriced”
Reviews.Author: ableassistant
Reviews.Content: stayed may 2007 first visit rome amalia excellent location vatican city bit walk short taxi metro ride old city across river rooms spacious spotless staff helpful stayed spacious family room large marble shower room reception area common area residents share front door always spotless inside hotel area perfect historic lift elevator experience perfectly safe breakfast second floor little sweet side could things sort thing small grocery shop next door side store cafe handy major shopping streets short walk metro would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location!!”
Reviews.Author: firstson
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed stay hotel amalia lovely building large quiet rooms breakfast absolutely fine perfect sweet loved old fashioned lift staff also helpful right place stay want near vatican etc metro near parts city things accessible foot paid night jan recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: SallyO
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights start dec overall happy quality hotel relation money paid around 3 nights 3 star rating hotel get hotel part old building hotel accomodation split across number floors number small also operating building result main shared sparse looks slightly run room fourth floor looked pretty much like shown hotels website others already commented beds little firm side point would stop anyone sleeping busy day sightseeing bathrooms modern clean showers small 23 size normal shower tray breakfast provided basic types cereal fruit 23 types cake bread rolls however reasonably priced coffee shops close prefer something substantial reception staff lovely helpful directions restaurant recommendations etc asked book taxi take us hotel paid possibly slightly expensive journey local white cab best thing hotel probably location busy safe part town hotel 510 mins walk vatican chapel 20 mins walk trevi fountain spanish steps walked everywhere 3 days rome found city reasonably easy get around hotel give map arrival really enjoyed trip rome likely stay amalia ever return

Reviews.Title: “Nice and comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: Serval
Reviews.Content: hotel recommended travel agent receptionists friendly helpful 5 minutes st peters basilica vatican museum room clean king size bed firm although bathroom clean bad smell coming basin shower complaint sorted shower smallest shower cubicle ever used hole blocked even problem resolved satisfaction breakfast good selection cereals rolls croissants beverages hotel recommended local pizzeria nearby e think worst food ever 3 days stayed rome pizza owners nothing improve quality food even complaint england

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: TBTA
Reviews.Content: nice hotel clean good location vatican city museums also well located metro good restaurant right next door pizza places shops coffee shops close however paid per night small double room natural light safe provided room free charge bathroom nice good shower ventilation bed king size comfortable could move around room time breakfast included price self service good choice cakes pastries cereal etc tea coffee would rated hotel higher room bit larger natural light

Reviews.Title: “A good experience”
Reviews.Author: KathieG
Reviews.Content: hotel amalia located within blocks st peters vatican mainly interested sightseeing good value money room large clean however realize rate include airconditioning luckily weather pleasant opened window pleasant breeze neighborhood quiet night problem noise breakfast good staff especially maria front desk helpful arranging trips airport transportation would recommend hotel friend

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GDLEB
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights last weekend sept booked via easyjet room 2 including breakfast room small clean well appointed hotel reception staff friendly helpful location great near vatican quiet residential area night couple good neighbourhood restaurants including right next door hotel near metro 3 stops spanish steps 1 euro top tip watch taxis ciampino airport get fixed price get

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Hotel Amalia”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed double classic room one bed 4 nights august euro per night including tax services buffet breakfast front staff helpful everyone spoke english room bathroom spacious clean breakfast okay big selection mostly cereals pastry bread breakfast room small went early always table hotel convenient location close vatican city short walk buses trains elevator tiny one room 5th floor ask lower level dont want use stairs

Reviews.Title: “A good base from which to explore Rome”
Reviews.Author: loddington
Reviews.Content: returned 3 nights amalia booked online easyjet hotels per room per night impressed got location excellent less 5 minute walk vatican 50 yards underground bus stops explore rome asked quiet room put room back ground floor view room lovely quiet newly decorated bathroom looked newly fitted room always cleaned well largest room city break happy staff friendly always willing help let breakfast limited cereal bread rolls croissant variety cake fine sweet

Reviews.Title: “Great value hotel”
Reviews.Author: paulj
Reviews.Content: hotel wonderful would stay arrived hot tired long trip states leonardo greet us make us feel welcome helpful requests even suggesting department store close really helped locate missing luggage hotel located close metro short walk vatican hotel clean comfortable nice family including 2 yr old

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cfsnco
Reviews.Content: american little shocked small size hotel room first good location help pleasant clearly old small everything else italy one block walk vatican museums two block walk st peters also several else right block including laundry stay pleasant breakfast mixed breads cereals coffee exactly expected would definetly recommend
